title: IT project manager
skills:
•	Pro-active (engaging & impact-oriented) mindset, ability to think end-to-end and honour the commitments made
•	6+ years of work experience in project management (PMBOK, AGILE, Scrum, Kanban)
•	4+ years of work experience as line manager in application support 
•	Ability to create, coach, guide and manage team (both operations and project)
•	Strong communication (both written and verbal) and facilitation skills (small and large groups) especially when interacting with different levels of business
•	Advanced knowledge in working in global corporate IT Infrastructure organizations and hands-on experience as administrator and tester in a past
•	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with different international cultures
•	Ability to translate business needs into solution architecture requirements 
•	Knowledge of ITIL, ISO 20000 & Cobit. Have an experience in process development & audit
•	Knowledge of the principles of relational databases, BI and Data Warehouse

experience.description:
•	Managed project schedule & budget &scope according to corporate standards
•	End-to-end responsibility for project delivery: Manage projects during all phases of assigned projects from Initiation Phase through Build Phase to GoLive and ProjectClosure
•	Created communication plan and was accountable for it`s execution (communication inside project team, with external teams and reporting to senior management)
•	Managed project team (internal employers, contractors, vendor`s teams) based both in ESSA and India
•	Selected vendors, managed tenders,  negotiated contracts and approved its wording with all stakeholders (tax, legal and etc.)
•	Forecasted potential risks and provided necessary follow up actions to avoid any issues and mitigate risks

HR projects (IT enablers for HR digital transformation):

(https://news.rambler.ru/other/43608431-tsifrovaya-transformatsiya-hr-keys-pepsico/):

1. Automated Recruitment processes («TA CRM Implementation» based on Skillaz platform)

2. Personalized corporate benefit profile for employers and tools for benefit management
 («Flexible Benefits» based on Benefactory platform).

3. «From hire to retire processes automation with Electronic signature implementation»
•	created infrastructure for eSignature and developed processes (request&creation \ extension \ recall) 
•	40+ business processes were rebuilt to enable eSignature
•	1500 pilot population, 20 000 after rollout
•	were first in Russia, got personal corporate reward (Bravo)


Other projects:

4. 1C ZUP (1C: Payroll and Staff administration) implementation for Kirgizstan 

5.  Data bus migration to new platform (SOA Upgrade)
• ~200 interfaces were moved without impact to SLA (downtime were less than 5 minutes)

6. Migration Oracle Hyperion based application to new version  (HFM Upgrade)
• 60% features were moved, 40% were rebuilt because of architecture difference between versions
• We had a requirement that we had 4 days for bug fixing after UAT and before GoLive, it gives us extremely high requirements for development and internal testing

7. Transition from VAT 18% to 20% according legal requirements (VAT20)
• All accounting systems (1C, Liasoft, RAT, Oracle, SAP) with were used in all Russian legal entities was prepared to VAT change in state-appointed date (VAT 18% before 1.01, VAT 20% in first minute of New Year, all refunds must have correct VAT depending on its circumstances)
• All accounting systems is highly customized, we had 3 months between initiation and GoLive and requirements with demand 500 man-hour for development
• High risk level for company (legal, financial and reputation risks)
• End-to-end UAT testing for all operations for Purchase To Pay и Orders To Cash processes in each ERP with all integrations. Both process are cross functional and demanded an extra high cooperation in test team. 
• SLA wasn`t broken

Managed projects for Risk department (scope, schedule, budget, quality, risks, communication from daily standups  to presentation for top management) 

Projects:
• Smart Data: 360-Degrees Customer Profile development
• Transfer and validation historical data about all borrowers from 2002 to 2016 to OKB (United Credit Bureau)
http://www.bki-okb.ru/press/news/obedinennoe-kreditnoe-byuro-i-bank-houm-kredit-zaklyuchili-soglashenie-o-sotrudnichestve
• United credit bus implementation (based on Credit Registry) for data exchange with credit bureaus

Application support was outsourced to Microtest LLC at first and after its bankruptcy I transferred my team to CSS LLC. Team transition was transparent for customers (there was no SLA breakdown, key team members  were retained).

• Managed transition to support process (support cost evaluation, acceptance process management, SLA review)
• Managed geographically-distributed team(2nd line in Moscow, 1st line in Salym and Tyumen+ external contractors)

Major achievements:
• Built a team with a unique set of skills and competence for petroleum production IT services support
• Accepted to support more than 70 services (DWH, BO, 1С, SharePoint, Jira)
• Support costs reduced by 20% with customer satisfaction rate kept after service refactoring
• Transition from manpower support model to service based support model
• KPI based reports was developed
• Transition to Sustain Process (for new services) was documented and committed with Project Office

Projects:
• Data warehouse migration (integration services server and interfaces)
• Transition to Naumen ServiceDesk
• Accounting software development for the oil transfers operation

•	Requirements management, Integration Management, Scope Management, Time Management, Risk Management, Cost Management
•	Created the projects' documentation (project documents, integration and interfaces docs, user guides and etc.)
•	Coordinated external teams for the flawless execution of project
•	Participated in presale activities (costs, budgets, scope)

Projects:
•	ITSM process automation and nternal portal for service catalog development (integration with telephony and monitoring included)
•	Work orders workflow automation
